definition: to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: Finish saying, leaving no chance to explain of, beat her horizontal to embrace.
sentences.chinese: 说完，不由分说的，将她打横抱起来。

sentences.english: On arriving there, everybody went into action in no time. We dug square pits first.
sentences.chinese: 到了目的地后，大家不由分说，争先恐后地干起来。

sentences.english: To the city, the men without any explanation, began attacking the city.
sentences.chinese: 到的城下，不由分说，开始攻城。

sentences.english: The holy is by definition pure: by definition.
sentences.chinese: 神圣不由分说肯定是纯洁的，肯定的。

sentences.english: On arriving there, everybody went into action in no time.
sentences.chinese: 到了目的地后，大家不由分说，争先恐后地干起来。

definition: not saying anything further (idiom); not raising any objection/without demur
regardless of the consequences/recklessly relying on a hopelessly optimistic forecast
pinyin: bu4 guan3 san1 qi1 er4 shi2 yi1

definition: with a lightning move of the hand
to pick up (from the ground with one's hands)
to adopt an attitude/to strike a posture
see 二話不說|二话不说[er4 hua4 bu4 shuo1]
to attempt all tasks at once/to manage every detail regardless of its importance
